storyInfo: Amiya is being forced to help penetrate the airship's defense systems. Ascalon arrives in the nick of time to save her, but she must face the revenant as the King of Sarkaz. The Damazti Cluster formally meets Eblana for the first time.

attributes.content: So this is the airship...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All our attempts to infiltrate it ended in failure. Anyone who approached simply vanished into thin air.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Is that some kind of Sarkaz witchcraft? Surely the Lord of Fiends would know how to neutralize it.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Is Theresa here?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I can't feel—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Urgh!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: A heavy pressure comes over her.
It is far too thick, far too cruel, to be described or spoken of.
Amiya can hardly stand.
What... is this...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What are you doing, Lord of Fiends? Don't try anything funny!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Neutralize it with your witchcraft! Or else...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Ugh—
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Sorry I'm late.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Calm down, Ascalon.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: This was all my colleague's plan! I tried to talk him out of it!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I don't intend to harm your Doctor. We're just getting a deal done. You'll be the witness.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Then get out of my way.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: You can't feel it because you're not Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: We're coming face to face with our history. The sum of the Sarkaz's millennia of suffering.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: It's angry. It's screaming, and it's making all of us listen to it.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: No wonder.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Ha, the dukes are going to be disappointed. This is no engineering or technology that can be copied.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The ship itself is a revenant.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.text: How did the Sarkaz live?
How did the Sarkaz live in the beginning?
The Elders and the Ancients had not come upon the land yet. All things were how they should be.
Then they came.
They killed and slaughtered. They brought barbarism and rage upon the land. Their fangs and claws were not pointed at just each other, but at us as well.
The proud Sarkaz never surrendered. We fought back.
We fought rage with rage. They will taste the fruit of vengeance!
But Kazdel was destroyed in the blink of an eye.
Despicable!
They stopped at nothing. They were cunning, shameless, cruel.
How dare they trample upon pure Kazdel?!
How dare they?!

attributes.content: Argh—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I... the voices...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't let it affect you, Amiya!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Resist the illusion!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I know, I'm trying...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Argh—Aah—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Kazdel was destroyed.
The King of Sarkaz and the Royal Court led us in the fight against the scum. The Sarkaz will not permit such shameful failure.
But those cowardly Sarkaz, who call themselves the Sankta, deserted their duty. They betrayed their people, betrayed themselves!
The walls fell again, and with it our dream.
No matter. The traitors will be purged. Kazdel will stand again.
As long as the King of Sarkaz still stands, we will never fall.

attributes.content: The shadows...
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: No, it's not like the shadows from Ines's Arts. What is it?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Get out of the airship's shadow, Doctor!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: The airship's shadow wriggles, stretches. The other 'Trilby Asher' whom Ascalon knocked to the ground disappears in the dark ocean.
What the hell is this...?
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Suffocating black, suffocating despair, suffocating fury.

attributes.text: The King of Sarkaz will lead us. The King of Sarkaz.
Thirty-four times did Kazdel fall.
Six hundred and seventy-five times did Kazdel fall.
Three thousand four hundred and twenty-one times did Kazdel fall.
The shortest it took was three days, between the rebuilding of Kazdel's walls, and the hoofs of pegasi trampling it to dust.
Time and again Kazdel was destroyed. Time and again, it was rebuilt.
Time has changed our faces and theirs. But the way has never ended. Our resistance never wavered.
But each rebuilding of Kazdel took longer than the previous one.
Our civilization was devastated. Our arts were forgotten.
But we still have our hatred. The King of Sarkaz will slay our foes with it!
I am proud of this, of our unwavering resolve.
But what do I see?
A twisted chimera...
An Outblood King?!
The King of Sarkaz who stands before me is an Outblood?!
This crown is not yours to wear! This pain is not yours to stand with!
This fury is not yours to stand for!
Answer me, impostor! Answer me, fraud!
Answer the revenant's question!

attributes.content: The revenant...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Open your eyes and see, False King!
What do you see?

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't look, Amiya! It's the revenant's witchcraft!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I saw tears.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I saw deep, heavy sorrow.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Has this sorrow always been with you?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Sorrow? This is no sorrow.
I feel no sorrow anymore.

attributes.content: You have scorched your wound with the flames of rage.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's... painful.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: I know what is real and what is false!
Answer my question!
How—dare you—
Twisted—Outblood—
How—dare—you—
Carry the burden of the Sarkaz!!!

attributes.content: Ascalon stumbles.
I... I'm fine...
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Amiya—
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Amiya looks up towards the great shadow of the revenant.
You cannot see her face. You only know she is looking up.
You're right, Revenant. I should see. I have seen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I have seen it all.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All three thousand four hundred and twenty-one destructions, every brick that turned to ash.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I saw the resistance of every King of Sarkaz. I saw their hearts, each and every one of them.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I saw the tears and blood swallowed. I saw the dust and broken pieces.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Familiar silhouettes fall, overlapping with one another. Familiar scenes replay themselves.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I have seen. I see. I will see.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I never averted my eyes, Revenant.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I will remember.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Every hard decision, every death and sacrifice, every destruction, every hope.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: —I made you see, Chimera.
I made you see!!
Impostor! There is not a single moment that I do not experience it, feel the burning flames!
But you?
Yes, you could see it, like a map, like a play, a mere passerby watching from above the cliffs.
I denounce you, False King, I despise you, not because of your foolishness, not because of your arrogance, not because of your conceit.
It's because you can never truly stand with us.

attributes.content: But I've tried—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Tried?
You could try to not avert your eyes—
But you can still turn away any time you choose.
You're not Sarkaz. You will never be.
The souls of the Sarkaz reject you.
You call our fate 'pain?' You say you try to endure it—
But we are fated to be buried by it for eternity.
You say you have the courage. But if the day comes that you can take it no more...
You can abandon us.

attributes.content: I won't—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: How many seasons have you seen? How dare you promise that you won't?
No, you will. You will, because you can.
How could Sarkaz pick such a king? How could Sarkaz accept such a king?

attributes.content: Theresa wanted me to be... she said we can share in the same feelings, even if we're not of the same blood!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.text: Then she was a fool!
If you truly share the same feelings... now that you have seen it all...
Why do you come before me?
Why do you try to stop this war?

attributes.content: Amiya finds herself at a loss for words.
Why does she want to stop this war?
She has seen the anger, the pain, the longing.
Why does she want to stop this war?
There is no other way for the Sarkaz.
No Sarkaz could come to any other answer, after coming face to face with it all.
But...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya realizes that, for an instant, she understood Theresa's choice.
Drown tears with tears, and bury suffering with suffering.
Only scorched earth will bring new life to the Sarkaz.
But...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Still... I renounce this path.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The revenant was right.
She renounced it. She can never truly stand with them.
She can leave.

attributes.text: Get out!
Get out of us!

attributes.content: The shadow wriggles furiously, splitting apart, growing so thick it seems to take physical form.
The chaotic shadow of the revenant emerges from the empty shipyard.
Hello there, big one.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: The purple flame impacts the black shadow.
You interest me, Revenant.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: What ember will you leave behind when you burn?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: That Draco... Eblana.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Nothing in the mission brief said she would show up!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: Go! Hurry!
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: I... I'm fine...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, I...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They're right... I can't stand with them...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Maybe that's why it has to be you.

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Draco's fire is getting closer!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: She's strong! We shouldn't try to fight her here!
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Hmph... interesting.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: I seem to hear that name often lately.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: G-General... the Draco...
attributes.name: Royal Court Soldier

attributes.content: Pay no heed.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Her flames burn nothing but her own short-sighted ambition.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Lead us away from here, Great Revenant. This shipyard is too small for your fury. The noises of those Outblood are not worth your time.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I have heard from the Regent. He is ready.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Your Royal Highness.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: The Sarkaz airship has taken off and is slowly turning towards Londinium.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: Battleship squadrons are ready to intercept on the perimeter.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: Other regiments are also assembling.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: The Duke of Windermere's fleet is already deployed near the plate. The Duke of Caster's ships are also in movement and will likely approach in short order.
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: Looks like everyone cares a lot about this place.
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Do they?
Aren't the dukes are little late?
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: You're... the manager of that hotel?
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: You're a Sarkaz mole in Londinium?
attributes.name: 'The Brigadier'

attributes.content: No, Colbert is just a Sarkaz cleaner who thinks he's Victorian.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Just some poor souls made to come out and work while having a chat with a friend.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: You're such a spoilsport, Draco.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Why not have a chat with me?
attributes.name: Eblana

attributes.content: Give us a break.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Let's get this over with.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster
